title: What is the meaning of John Lennon’s lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: What is the meaning of John Lennon’s lyrics? Baby's good to me, you knowMy girlfriend behaves generously and affectionately towards me, are you aware of this? She's happy as can be, you knowEmotionally, she is maximally positive, are you aware of this? She said soShe has verbally asserted that this is the case. I'm in love with her and I feel fineI feel a mixture of deep affection, sexual attraction and protectiveness towards her, and I am very content. Baby says she's mine, you knowMy girlfriend announces that she is indeed my girlfriend, are you aware of this? She tells me all the time, you knowShe incessantly repeats this announcement, are you aware of this? She said soShe has verbally asserted that this is the case. I'm in love with her and I feel fineI feel a mixture of deep affection, sexual attraction and protectiveness towards her, and I am very content. I'm so glad that she's my little girl (ooh-ooh)I am extremely pleased that she is in a relationship with me. (incoherent noises) She's so glad she's telling all the world (ooh-ooh)She is sufficiently pleased that she is broadcasting the fact globally. (incoherent noises) … and so on.

People read so much into John’s lyrics and half the time it was just nonsense. John admitted as much. if you know the video of him talking with the slightly out of focus homeless guy outside of his mansion back in 70(?)…..maybe 71(?) who is asking john what does it all mean……and john was like, half the time I’m just rhyming words and they don’t mean anything at all.
